name: Format\GradientFill
description: The properties shared by all gradient fill types.

properties.name: colorStops
properties.description: An array of color stops. Each stop sets a color and location along the gradient.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of gradient; for example linear_gradient.

properties.name: attachment
properties.description: A string that indicates how the fill should behave when a user scrolls.
